DOC.brief_summary: This study is a randomized clinical trial comparing outcomes of Integrated Cognitive Behavioral Treatment plus standard medications for veterans with both substance use disorders, depressive disorders versus the most commonly administered form of therapy for substance use disorders and depression, Twelve Step Facilitation (AA/NA model) group treatment plus medications.
DOC.brief_title: Integrated Intervention for Substance Abusers With Depressive Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a randomized clinical trial comparing outcomes of Integrated Cognitive Behavioral Treatment plus standard medications for veterans with both substance use disorders, depressive disorders versus the most commonly administered form of therapy for substance use disorders and depression, Twelve Step Facilitation (AA/NA model) group treatment plus medications. Follow-up assessments were conducted at quarterly intervals for one year following treatment.
DOC.criteria: Veterans age 18 and older with alcohol, cannabinol, and/or stimulant dependence and independent mood disorders will be included. Psychotic disorders
